column2: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that all employees and contractors are using the most current and complete set of drawings
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS & WP
○ Ensure that all employees and contractors involved in the welding process have been inducted onto the relevant Hotworks permit
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure the materials and equipment gathered are for the correct type of connection being made. Inspect the mould ID tag to ensure that it corresponds to the application, indicated by the following parameters:
○ Check to ensure the graphite mould is not worn or broken, which could cause leakage of molten weld metal during the reaction.
○ Ensure a working fire extinguisher is available within 10 metres of the working area.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Eritech CADWELD Exothermic Welding Manual Fig. 2, 3, 4
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure the position of the conductors being welded is correct. Heat mould to ensure it is dry. Strip & clean conductors, ensure they are dry & clean.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Design Drawings and Register
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Each WeldEnsure conductors are correctly positioned in the mould, allowing the mould to close tightly.
○ Ensure welding material has been insected and is intact.
○ Ensure reaction is completed and molten material has solidified (allow 30 seconds post ignition)
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Eritech CADWELD Exothermic Welding Manual Fig. 2, 3, 4
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure weld is inspected and that a quality connection has been made.All welds shall be inspected a Fulton Hogan engineer.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Eritech CADWELD Exothermic Welding Manual Fig. 2, 3, 4
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
